title: GRUND and Leipziger Ornamente released
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193506im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schild_lpz_orn_01t_6240.png)

I take the pleasure to announce my latest releases, [Grund](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193506/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andreas-stotzner/grund/), another art deco exercise; and [Leipziger Ornamente](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193506/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andreas-stotzner/leipziger-ornamente/), which I adapted from architectural ornaments mostly.  
Hope you like it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414193506im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schild-grund-3t_5785.png)
author: Andreas Stötzner
